notesForUsage: Versions of tools can be written in NPM semver style described here: https://github.com/npm/node-semver.

gradle.name: Gradle
gradle.note: Optional. Gradle Wrapper <sup>2</sup> can be used instead.

node.name: Node
node.note: Optional. Gradle node plugin <sup>3</sup> can be used instead.

npm.name: npm
npm.note: Optional. Gradle node plugin <sup>3</sup> can be used instead.
